mapper.sql: id, type, sub_type, default_number, number, create_time, oper_time, organ_id, creator, account_id, change_amount, back_amount, total_price, pay_type, bill_type, noti_number, taxid, buyer_name, receive_name, telephone, cellphone, address, remark, file_name, sales_man, account_id_list, account_money_list, discount, discount_money, discount_last_money, other_money, deposit, main_arrival, extras_arrival, agreed_delivery, delivered, status, purchase_status, custom_number, source_number, link_number, import_flag, tenant_id, delete_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jsh_depot_head
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT id,header_id,item_id,status,driver_id,assign_date,assign_user,file_path FROM jsh_depot_detail WHERE header_id = ${headerId} and status >= 0;
SELECT status, date FROM jsh_depot_record WHERE detail_id = ${detailId} ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id,datetime,message,feedback FROM jsh_depot_report WHERE detail_id = ${detailId} ORDER BY datetime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into jsh_depot_detail (id, header_id, item_id, status, driver_id, assign_date, assign_user, file_path) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{headerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into jsh_depot_record (id, detail_id, status, date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
